channel.title: Adventure on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Adventure on Home

item.title: Iceland Trip
item.description: In August 2025, we took a week-long campervan trip around Iceland — from Golden Circle hot springs to South Coast waterfalls, glacier lagoons, Eastfjords fishing villages, and the wildlife of the north and Snæfellsnes. It was seven days of drone flights, hot river soaks, black sand beaches, endless waterfalls, and fresh fish dinners — each day with its own theme and adventure. Here’s our day-by-day itinerary and the highlights that made this trip unforgettable.
